name: Outbreak Day
description:
Outbreak day is a  game about shooting zombies! You have one mission, and that is to survive the endless waves of zombies coming your way, so you better get started shooting or ending as zombie breakfast! 

The game is an endless wave shooter that's getting harder and harder for every round, More zombies will come and they will get stronger and stronger for every wave you survive. After every wave, can you choose what to get, so what's more important? more health, damage, or firing rate? 

How long can you survive, plz let me hear what wave you achieved to survive too?

I made this game to improve my skills in game development so feedback is welcome

Controls

Moving   -  WASD keys or Arrow Keys

Shooting - Mouse button

If you are a champion zombie killer, can you spawn 10 extra zombies with pressing E
